meta.name: OpponentArchetypes_v1.0
meta.description: Archetype classification for NHL opponents to drive matchup-specific gameplans in Leafs Dynasty AI.
meta.author: Leafs Architect GPT

archetypes.label: Chaos Forecheck / Heavy Pressure
archetypes.description: High-pressure forecheck teams that thrive on turnovers, broken plays, and heavy hits. Often use aggressive forecheck, high pressure, and strong-side overloads.

forecheck: 1-2-2 Passive to start, then 2-3 in 2nd period
neutral_zone: 1-2-2 Red, switch to 1-3-1 when protecting lead
defensive_pressure: Contain Puck, temporary Protect Net when pinned
quick_breakout: Stay Wide by default, Close Support when hemmed in

archetypes.label: Rush-Heavy Offense
archetypes.description: Teams that rely on speed through the neutral zone, controlled entries, and east–west plays off the rush more than extended cycle.

forecheck: 1-2-2 Red to slow entries, 2-3 when trailing
neutral_zone: 1-3-1 when leading or under heavy rush pressure
defensive_pressure: Contain Puck, avoid over-pressing at blue line
quick_breakout: Close Support versus heavy backpressure, Leave Zone Early when chasing game

archetypes.label: Heavy Point Cycle / Net-Front Traffic
archetypes.description: Teams that work the puck low-to-high, take point shots through traffic, and lean on net-front screens and rebounds.

forecheck: 1-2-2 Passive or 2-3 depending on breakout quality
defensive_pressure: Contain Puck with Protect Net bursts when pinned
defensive_strategy: Staggered to protect slot over point lanes

archetypes.label: Trap / Structure-First Teams
archetypes.description: Teams that sit in structured systems, slow the game in the neutral zone, and force dump-and-chase hockey.

forecheck: 2-3 when chasing offense, 1-2-2 Passive to avoid trading mistakes
neutral_zone: 1-2-2 Red as base, switch to 1-3-1 only when defending lead
offensive_pressure: Aggressive in 2nd period to break trap rhythm
quick_breakout: Stay Wide to stretch defensive box, Close Support when trapped on walls

archetypes.label: Balanced Hybrid Teams
archetypes.description: Teams that mix rush, cycle, and forecheck pressure without extreme bias. They adapt to score/game state.

forecheck: Start 1-2-2 Passive, escalate to 2-3 when needing momentum
offensive_pressure: Standard early, Aggressive when chasing or in 2nd period
quick_breakout: Stay Wide as default, Close Support selectively

team_mapping.DET_NOTE: DET is explicitly treated as chaos_forecheck in ReliabilityPatch_v5.2 as well.

usage_notes: When generating a gameplan, Dynasty GPT should resolve the opponent’s archetype first, then select systems and adjustments consistent with the recommended_counters.
If a team is not found in team_mapping, default to 'balanced_hybrid' until explicitly classified in a later version.
Archetypes are descriptive, not prescriptive; all systems must still remain within Canon and NHL 25 legal options.
